name: "Lens Flare"
oracle_text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
"Lens Flare" deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Etchings of the Chosen
oracle_text:
As Etchings of the Chosen enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature of the chosen type: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

name: Plague Engineer
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
As Plague Engineer enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type your opponents control get -1/-1.

name: Goblin Anarchomancer
oracle_text: Each spell you cast that's red or green costs {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: A good Gruul shaman can work a whole clan into a frenzy. A great one will wait until the enemy's nearby.

name: Changeling Outcast
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Changeling Outcast can't block and can't be blocked.
flavor_text: A mercurial face sows distrust. Distrust reaps a lonely life.

name: Goblin Anarchomancer
oracle_text: Each spell you cast that's red or green costs {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: A good Gruul shaman can work a whole clan into a frenzy. A great one will wait until the enemy's nearby.

name: Lavabelly Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life."
flavor_text: Warm enough to incubate eggs or incinerate those who would eat them.

name: Magmatic Sinkhole
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Magmatic Sinkhole deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Opening like the maw of a hellion, the earth swallowed the traveler whole.

name: Gouged Zealot
oracle_text:
Reach
Delirium — Whenever Gouged Zealot attacks, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Gouged Zealot deals 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.
flavor_text: He can't fear what he can't see.

name: Arcbound Tracker
oracle_text:
Menace
Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
Whenever you cast a spell other than your first spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Tracker.

name: Vermin Gorger
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Once, vampires ruled this world, commanding the fear and respect that befit our noble blood. Have we truly sunk so low?"
—Sorin Markov

name: Tragic Fall
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Hellbent — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if you have no cards in hand.
flavor_text: Every final journey begins with a single misstep.

name: Tizerus Charger
oracle_text:
Escape—{4}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Tizerus Charger escapes with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or a flying counter on it.

name: Nested Shambler
oracle_text: When Nested Shambler dies, create X tapped 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens, where X is Nested Shambler's power.
flavor_text: Home is where the heart was.

name: Loathsome Curator
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Menace
When Loathsome Curator exploits a creature, destroy target creature you don't control with mana value 3 or less.
flavor_text: She collects only the choicest of deaths.

name: Hell Mongrel
oracle_text:
Discard a card: Hell Mongrel gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: It feeds on shadows, fear, and blood.

name: Gilt-Blade Prowler
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Activate only if you've discarded a card this turn.
flavor_text:
"Let's just say my people are in the business of capital acquisition and intellectual property speculation."
—Er-Miral

name: Cabal Initiate
oracle_text:
Discard a card: Cabal Initiate gains lifelink until end of turn.
Threshold — Cabal Initiate get +1/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text: "Hear our prayers, oh Shadowed One, and bless us in body agony."

name: Recalibrate
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you've discarded a card this turn, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Trial 991: Still encountering issues with accidental aetherization. Maybe if we widen the dimensional matrix to 0.7?"
—Izzet research notes

name: Parcel Myr
oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice Parcel Myr: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Crack it open. Maybe it knows something we can use."
—Kara Vrist, Mirran resistance

name: Foul Watcher
oracle_text:
Flying
When Foul Watcher enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
Delirium — Foul Watcher gets +1/+0 as long as there are four more card types among cards in your graveyard.

name: Etherium Spinner
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "Thopters from a foundry always lack that personal touch."

name: Burdened Aerialist
oracle_text:
When Burdened Aerialist enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Whenever you sacrifice a token, Burdened Aerialist gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Curse this glorious golden weight!"

name: Soul of Migration
oracle_text:
Flying
When Soul of Migration enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.
Evoke {3}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Piercing Rays
oracle_text:
Exile target tapped creature.
Forecast—{2}{W}, Reveal Piercing Rays from your hand: Tap target untapped creature. (Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: The forecast calls for pain.

name: Marble Gargoyle
oracle_text:
Flying
{W}: Marble Gargoyle gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Once past the stony exterior, the meat is exquisite and can be stuffed with thallids or simmered in a broth of manticore venom."
—Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar
*The Underworld Cookbook*

name: Knighted Myr
oracle_text:
{2}{W}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Knighted Myr, it gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"This one fights like a leonin!"
—Jor Kadeen

name: Guardian Kirin
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Guardian Kirin.
flavor_text:
Followed the kirin
—Ojutai expression meaning
"died a hero's death"

name: Fairgrounds Patrol
oracle_text: {1}{W}, Exile Fairgrounds Patrol from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: "No signs of any suspicious activity. Yet."

name: Disciple of the Sun
oracle_text:
Lifelink
When Disciple of the Sun enters the battlefield, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Heart of a titan, faith as bright as the dawn.

name: Arcbound Prototype
oracle_text: Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
flavor_text: It flickered to life, saw itself alone, and began to rebuild.

name: Resurgent Belief
oracle_text:
Suspend 2—{1}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Aura with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)
